update member_user
full_name = #{fullName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
group_id = #{groupId,jdbcType=INTEGER},

update member_user set full_name = #{fullName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, group_id = #{groupId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, email = #{email,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, sex = #{sex,jdbcType=INTEGER}, point = #{point,jdbcType=INTEGER}, status = #{status,jdbcType=INTEGER}, addtime = #{addtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, endtime = #{endtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, balance = #{balance,jdbcType=BIGINT}, prov = #{prov,jdbcType=INTEGER}, city = #{city,jdbcType=INTEGER}, area = #{area,jdbcType=INTEGER}, address = #{address,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, paycode = #{paycode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, year = #{year,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, month = #{month,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, day = #{day,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, career = #{career,jdbcType=INTEGER}, single = #{single,jdbcType=INTEGER}, category_id = #{categoryId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, sm_id = #{smId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, identity = #{identity,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, wx_code = #{wxCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, invite_code = #{inviteCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, note = #{note,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where m_id = #{mId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select m.* from member_user m,member_bank_card bank,member me where m.m_id=bank.m_id and me.id=m.m_id and me.id=bank.m_id group by bank.m_id

select muser.* from member_user muser,member m where 1=1 and m.id=muser.m_id
and muser.m_id = #{mId}
and m.username like CONCAT(CONCAT('%', #{username}), '%')
and m.phone like CONCAT(CONCAT('%', #{phone}), '%')
and muser.status=#{status}
and( m.username like CONCAT(CONCAT('%', #{key}), '%') or muser.m_id = #{key} or m.phone like CONCAT(CONCAT('%', #{key}), '%') or muser.full_name like CONCAT(CONCAT('%', #{key}), '%') )
and muser.addtime >= #{addtime} and muser.addtime <= #{endtime}
order by muser.m_id asc
order by muser.m_id desc
order by muser.addtime desc
order by muser.addtime desc
mapper.update:

point = #{point,jdbcType=INTEGER},
note = #{note,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
balance = #{balance,jdbcType=BIGINT},
where m_id = #{mId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select muser.point,muser.sex,muser.addtime,muser.status from member_user muser where muser.m_id = #{mId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
select mu.* from member_user mu,order_main os where mu.m_id=os.m_id and os.id=#{0}
